title: Kate Ritchie wows in an elegant black gown at ACRAs
text:
Kate Ritchie wowed on the red carpet of the Australian Commercial Radio Awards in Brisbane on Saturday.

The former Home and Away star, 41, turned heads in a black strapless gown by local designer Velani.

Her slender figure and cleavage was accentuated by a belt and the frock's fitted corset that shimmered under the lights.

Va va voom! Nova radio star Kate Ritchie (pictured) flaunted her slender figure in an elegant black gown at the Australian Commercial Radio Awards in Brisbane on Saturday

The showstopping floor-length skirt featured layers of organza material that angelically flowed across the floor.

Kate accessorised her evening look with matching onyx and diamond statement jewellery and a black studded bracelet.

For makeup, she opted for a glowing peachy look with nude glossy lips and false lashes for added volume.

Glamorous: The former Home And Away star, 41, accessorised her evening look with matching onyx and diamond statement jewellry and a black studded bracelet

Meanwhile, Kate's hair was styled up in a sleek and elegant bun with a ribbon.

The former Home and Away star appeared to be having a great time with her afternoon drive time co-host Tim Blackwell, as they shared a laugh on the red carpet.

Kate's glamorous red carpet look comes after she revealed that she would be making her TV comeback last month.

Having a laugh: Kate appeared to have a great time with her afternoon drive time co-host Tim Blackwell, as they laughed on the red carpet

Taking to Instagram, she announced she will soon be appearing in an upcoming episode of ABC's Play School Story Time as a celebrity narrator.

In the video, she held Play School character Scrap the dog and said: 'I'm here with my friend Scrap, can you have a guess where I might be?'

She continued: 'I can't tell you too much right now but I will very soon, stay tuned.'

In the caption, she jokingly added: '[Scrap] excellently held my hand today.'

authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
